name: Sony Music Entertainment
membership: IFPI --  www.ifpi.org -- and its national groups
goal: Sony Music Entertainment is a global recorded music company with a current roster that includes a broad array of both local artists and international superstars.  The company boasts a vast catalog that comprises some of the most important recordings in history.  It is home to premier record labels representing music from every genre.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Culture, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Trade
euInitiatives: Intellectual Property and other chapters of Trade negotiations; Copyright Directive; E-Commerce Directive; Geo-Blocking Regulation; GDPR/Privacy; Data access; IP Enforcement; etc.
